name: Roll A Ball (HadBabits)
description:
Created in the Linux Unity editor using a tutorial on Unity's website. I'm getting graphical glitches on the native build that don't appear in the WebGL build, please tell me if you see any graphical flickering.

Just extract the folder and run the executable inside. Linux only right now.

Edit: I've now determined it's not just my rig and also added a Windows version.
